name: RAT RACE X
description:
Download the game for Windows! Play as a swarm of hungry rats looking for a bite to eat. Guide them around the large city level and devour everything in sight. Watch out for the timer though as you've only got 250 seconds.

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to guide your rats
  • Hover the mouse over any eatable object
  • If you have enough rats to eat it they will do it automatically
  • Otherwise they will ignore the food and you need to go and eat smaller objects
  • Press F11 to switch to fullscreen

This game was made by
